summary: IWM makes it harder to find ingots or ore from loots. Also changes weights and price in dwarven ingot. Ore weights more than ingot, because it has impurities.
descriptionHtml:
IWM as Ingots Weight More v1.1

== requirements

Dragonborn and Dawnguard DLCs

== about

This mod makes it harder to find ingots or ore from loots. Also changes weights and prices: ore weights more than ingot because it has impurities.

Ore, weight, value

Corundum 4 (value 8) 
Ebony 14 (value 10) 
Gold 6,5 (value 12)
Iron 9,5 (value 2) 
Malachite 5,5 (value 9)
Moonstone 7 (value 10) 
Orichalcum 9 (value 8) 
Quicksilver 4,5 (value 3) 
Silver 5 (value 5) 
Stalhrim 4 (value 20)

Ingot, weight, value

Corundum 2 (value 15)
Dwarven 15 (value 120) 
Ebony 9 (value 150) 
Gold 4 (value 600) 
Iron 7,5 (value 10) 
Malachite 4 (value 90) 
Moonstone 3,5 (value 100) 
Orichalcum 7 (value 20) 
Quicksilver 2,5 (value 30) 
Silver 3 (value 90)
Steel 8 (value 20)

Gems and reduced values

- approx 10x for normal gems (for example garnet from 100 to 10)
- approx 2x for flawless gems (for example flawless garnet from 150 to 75)

Why values of gems are changed ?

- because they are so easy to acquire

This mod is good add-on to MRLT mod http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38579/
author: i73fi
